new-snapshot.title: New snapshot
new-snapshot.description: The snapshot will save the current state of the panel:
new-snapshot.bullet-point2: Position of machines in the flow
new-snapshot.bullet-point3: Position of internal networks in the flow
new-snapshot.note: Note: Snapshot name must be unique
new-snapshot.error-too-short: Snapshot name must be at least 3 characters long.
new-snapshot.error-too-long: Snapshot name must not be longer than 24 characters.
new-snapshot.error-bad-characters: Snapshot names can only include letters, digits and following special characters:
new-snapshot.error-duplicate: Snapshot with this name already exists.

modify-snapshots.title: Modify and delete snapshots
modify-snapshots.description-empty1: To get started, create a new snapshot by clicking the

validation.username-too-short: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.username-invalid-first: Username must start with a letter.
validation.username-invalid-characters: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, hyphens and periods.
validation.username-duplicate: User with this username already exists.
validation.email-duplicate: User with this email already exists.
validation.password-too-short: Password must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.password-no-number: Password must contain at least one digit.
validation.password-no-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
validation.password-no-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validation.password-no-special: Password must contain at least one special symbol.
validation.cannot-revoke-role: Cannot revoke role {{name}} from this user as it would leave at least one permission unassigned and pernamently lock access to essential CVMM features.

permission-list.client: This account DOES NOT have any administrative access.
permission-list.machines-view-manage: This user can VIEW, MANAGE all virtual machines.
permission-list.machines-view: This user can VIEW all virtual machines, but MANAGE only their own.
permission-list.machines-manage: This user can VIEW, MANAGE their own virtual machines.
permission-list.machines: This user can VIEW, MANAGE their own virtual machines.
permission-list.users-view: This user can VIEW all accounts.
permission-list.users-manage-administrative-client: This user can MANAGE both administrative and client accounts.
permission-list.users-manage-administrative: This user can MANAGE administrative accounts.
permission-list.users-manage-client: This user can MANAGE client accounts.
permission-list.users-password-administrative-client: This user can CHANGE both administrative and client account's PASSWORDS.
permission-list.users-password-administrative: This user can CHANGE both administrative and client account's PASSWORDS.
permission-list.users-password-client: This user can CHANGE both administrative and client account's PASSWORDS.
permission-list.manage-iso-files: This user can MANAGE global ISO files.
permission-list.manage-system-resources: This user can MANAGE system resource limits.

create-group.title: Create New Group
create-group.description: You're creating a public group of clients that will be visible and modifiable by all administrators.
create-group.name: Name
create-group.name-note: Note: Group name must be unique

validation.name-too-short: Group name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.name-duplicate: Group with this name already exists.
validation.clients-too-few: Group must consist of at least two clients.

leaving.title: You're leaving the page
leaving.description: You have unsaved changes that will be permanently lost if you leave this page. Are you sure you want to continue?

unsaved.title: Are you sure?
unsaved.description: Performing this action will discard all current changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

account-removal.title: Account removal
account-removal.description_one: Selected account will be removed. Are you sure you want to continue?
account-removal.description_other: All {{count}} selected accounts will be removed. Are you sure you want to continue?

group-removal.title: Group removal
group-removal.description_one: Selected group will be removed. Are you sure you want to continue?
group-removal.description_other: All {{count}} selected groups will be removed. Are you sure you want to continue?

np-restore.title: Confirm restoration
np-restore.description: Performing this action will discard all current changes and revert to the currently active configuration. Are you sure you want to continue?

np-refresh.title: Confirm machines data refresh
np-refresh.description: By refreshing the machines you will discard all unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

import-iso.title: Import ISO File
import-iso.description: Imported ISO file will be visible by all the administrators and modifiable by ones with proper permissions.
import-iso.name-note: Note: File name must be unique
import-iso.name: Entry name
import-iso.url-note: Enter the valid URL to the file

validation.name-too-short: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.name-invalid-first: Name must start with a letter.
validation.name-invalid-characters: Name may only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscores, hyphens and periods.
validation.name-duplicate: Record with this name already exists.
validation.file-invalid-extension: Selected file must have an .iso extension.

create-machine.title: Create New Machine
create-machine.source-type-description: Choose between creating a new VM from an ISO file or restoring one from a snapshot.
create-machine.description-disks: Here you can add additional disks for the machine.

validation.name-too-short: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.name-invalid-first: Name must start with a letter.
validation.name-invalid-characters: Name may only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscores, hyphens and periods.
validation.tags-invalid-first: Tag must start with a letter.
validation.tags-invalid-characters: Tags may only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscores, hyphens and periods.

description.main: Use this modal to quickly generate several virtual machines at once.
description.set-of-machines: Add machines configurations and choose how many copies of each to create.
description.create-for-group: If enabled, the defined set of machines will be created for every client in the chosen group. Clients from the group will be automatically assigned to approperiate machines.

validation.group-not-selected: You must select a client group.
